verses.name: Ezekiel 7:4
verses.text: And mine eye shall not spare thee, neither will I have pity: but I will recompense thy ways upon thee, and thine abominations shall be in the midst of thee: and ye shall know that I am the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:5
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; An evil, an only evil, behold, is come.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:6
verses.text: An end is come, the end is come: it watcheth for thee; behold, it is come.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:7
verses.text: The morning is come unto thee, O thou that dwellest in the land: the time is come, the day of trouble is near, and not the sounding again of the mountains.
